_source.text: #1416: I don't see any way that Vancouver is clearly better than Detroit or St. Louis.

text: #1416: I don't see any way that Vancouver is clearly **better** **than** **Detroit** or **St**. **Louis**.

_source.text: 7.) AFC West - How weird is it that the Chargers and the 49ers have basically become the same team at 4-8? Regardless of that fact, the AFC West got a huge win thanks to Denver's upset in New York, and the Raiders at this point have to be considered a half-step better than either Seattle or St. Louis.

text: 7.) AFC West - How weird is it that the Chargers and the 49ers have basically become the **same** team at 4-8? Regardless of that fact, the AFC West got a huge win thanks to Denver's upset in New York, and the Raiders at this point have to be considered a half-step **better** **than** either Seattle or **St**. **Louis**.

_source.text: 4. Boston's +35 third period goal differential is better than the overall differential of all but five other teams (Detroit, Vancouver, NY Rangers, Pittsburgh, St. Louis).

text: 4. Boston's +35 third period goal differential **is** **better** **than** the overall differential of all but five other teams (**Detroit**, Vancouver, NY Rangers, Pittsburgh, **St**. **Louis**).

_source.text: 5. Local announcers - From the good (George Blaha in Detroit, Jerry Reynolds in Sacramento) to the bad (Tommy Heinsohn in Boston, Sean Elliott in San Antonio) to the fine (Stephanie Ready in Charlotte, Stacy Paetz in Indiana), it's better than listening to the same ol' national crew every week.

text: Charlotte, Stacy Paetz in Indiana), it's **better** **than** listening to the **same** ol' national crew every week.

_source.text: A few years ago I learned not all Dijon style mustards are the same, some are sharper and some emulsify better than others.

text: A few years ago I learned not all **Dijon** style mustards are the **same**, some are sharper and some emulsify **better** **than** others.
